title: Favourite Eve's Pudding
ingredients: ['4 cooking apples - peeled, cored and sliced', '1 teaspoon grated lemon zest', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon', '2 tablespoons soft brown sugar', 'handful raisins (optional)', '200g self-raising flour', '200g butter, diced', '80g soft brown sugar', '4 eggs, beaten']
